snippet: After two decades, Out of the Closet Vintage, a magnet for those seeking styles from the past, moved to the town of Tannersville in the Catskills....
abstract: Profile of iconic Out of the Closet Vintage store, which closed its doors in Hamptons in 2014, only to re-open in Tannersville, NY; shop, run by Lucy Martin, is known among designers and stylists for its collection of high-end clothes that span decades of fashion.
lead_paragraph: After two decades, Out of the Closet Vintage, a magnet for those seeking styles from the past, moved to the town of Tannersville in the Catskills.

headline.main: A Trove of Hamptons Glamour Finds a New, Humbler Home
headline.print_headline: A Trove of Hamptons Glamour, at Home in the Mountains

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Out of the Closet Vintage (Tannersville, NY, Retailer)
